name: Football Legend (itch)
description:
Football Legend is a multiplayer football game. Choose your position on the field and play with your friends against others teams. Customize your character to improve your skills and be the best Football Legend player.

System Requirements
  System Requirements  Minimum  Recommended  CPU  2.0 GHz  2.0 GHz or higher  Memory  1 GB  2 GB  Video Card  Intel HD Graphics  Intel HD Graphics  Hard Disk  500 MB  1 GB  System  Windows 8  Windows 8 or higher  Direct X  9  9 or higher  Internet  Cable/DSL  Cable/DSL or better
